root.name: J.B. Harold Series #2: Manhattan Requiem - Angels Flying in the Dark
root.description: The game was first released in Japan for the NEC PC-9801, FM-7 and Sharp X68000 computers in 1987. It was later released in both the United States and Japan for the Pioneer LaserActive console in 1993. A remake of the game was later released for the Nintendo DS in 2008. Up until 2010, the game had sold over 200,000 copies. The game was also released internationally for the iPhone in 2011.
